title: The Inside Story of Mass Effect 3's Endings, Finally Told

media:group.media:title: The Inside Story of Mass Effect 3's Endings, Finally Told
media:group.media:description:
Almost a decade on from the release of Mass Effect 3, we talk to those who worked on it about the gigantic backlash prompted by the game's endings.

Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PeopleMakeGames
